body: And I mean to clarify how does a KID get a Child Size Sex Toy, and where did she get the money for a condom and the sex toy. But the sex toy is weird on itself too because Sex toys aren’t for children💀💀

This one was okay actually. It was not by all means GOOD but it wasn’t bad.
ART: 2/10 I liked it |||
PLOT: 1/10 The plot was meh okay at best terrible pacing too |||
SEX SCENES: 2/10 Pretty good sex scenes just didn’t like him not being the dominator but eh it doesn’t really matter, I really took off a point because the condoms and sex toys didn’t make since (explanation at the bottom)
COMMON SENSE: 0/10 We didn’t get backstory to why they just randomly had sex, Condom and Sex Toys didn’t make since (again, explanation at the Bottom)
OVERALL LIKEABILITY: 1/10 I mean I liked it a little bit I guess because of it being Shota, my personal favorite, and because of the Art too. But that’s it I didn’t like some factors in the doujin so yeah.
Overall Rating: 6/10
Yeah this was pretty Mid overall except the Art maybe. 
EXPLANATION: The Sex Toy and Condom didn’t make sense because how the fuck does a 13 year old get FUCKING CONDOMS AND CHILD SIZE SEX TOYS?!!Most Kids don’t have money.

Welcome back to Trolldiers Sauce show where today I’m checking out this one recommended to me by a good friend, let me read it then I’ll get back down here🥴💀. Remember there are 5 Key components of a good Doujin over 25 pages.
1: Art
2: Plot
3: Sex Scenes
4: Common Sense
5: Overall Likeability

1= 2/10
2= 2/10
3= 3/10
4= 1/10
5= 2/10
        =
 10/10
